option.name: description
option.value:
This "course" contains the interactive lab exercises for the CS1026 labs for the fall term, 2016 for both Sections 001 and 002. These exercises make use of PyCharm version 2. Within the "course" done with PyCharm, you will find "labs" and within each you will find "tasks". The tasks are done within PyCharm. Instructions on how to download the "course" and initiate it in PyCharm can be found on the course website.
Descriptions of each lab AND the description of a lab programming exercise can be found in the course website. Please make sure to read the description and the exercise before coming to lab.

option.name: possibleAnswer
option.value: # Print the variable that you just assigned a value to.

option.name: possibleAnswer
option.value: "X is smaller than or equal to 5"

option.name: possibleAnswer
option.value: print("On iteration",i," tried to divide by zero!")
